Breakpoints.Injector: Allocation Tab - Spaghetti/Counterfeit % to 0; Adventure Tab - Turn on Combat (Target: High Security Base, Idle Mode, Allow Fallthrough); Gold Tab - Disable
Breakpoints.Comment: Only buy 1-2 of the most expensive augments you can afford then focus the rest of the gold on the first Blood Ritual (for Number gain) once unlocked

Energy.Comment: Swap to AUG-4 later in the run

Gear.Comment: Max P/T Gear - Gold + Wandoos Accessories, maybe use 440 instead of 136 for maximum Wandoos speed?

Rebirth.Comment: Option: Disable rebirth when close and eat a Fruit of Power to get past the final stretch, maybe also bump up the Target once rebirths last >20 minutes?
